addMarket(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint25.details: Add a new trading market (only owner)

addSupportedToken(address,bytes32).details: Add a supported collateral token (only owner)

checkUpkeep(bytes).details: Chainlink Automation: Check if upkeep (liquidation) is needed

returns.performData: Encoded list of positions to liquidate
returns.upkeepNeeded: True if any positions need liquidation

closePosition(uint256).details: Close an open position (only position owner)

params.positionId: The ID of the position to close

emergencyWithdraw(address).details: Emergency withdraw all tokens from contract (only owner)

getMarketData(bytes32).details: Get market data for an asset pair

getPosition(uint256).details: Get details of a position by ID

getUserCollateral(address,address).details: Get user's collateral balance for a token

getUserPositions(address).details: Get all position IDs for a user

liquidatePosition(uint256).details: Liquidate an undercollateralized position (only liquidation bot)

params.positionId: The ID of the position to liquidate

openPosition(bytes32,uint8,uint256,uint2.details: Open a new perpetual trading position

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.performData: Encoded list of positions to liquidate

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCCIPReceiver(address).details: Set the CCIP receiver address (only owner)

setFeeRecipient(address).details: Set the fee recipient address (only owner)

setLendingPool(address).details: Set the lending pool address (only owner)

setLiquidationBot(address).details: Set the liquidation bot address (only owner)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateFundingRate(bytes32,int256).details: Update funding rate for an asset pair (only owner)
